sentences.en: A loft conversion can add considerably to the value of a house.
sentences.cn: 将阁楼改造一下就可以使房子的价值大增。

sentences.en: By converting the loft, they were able to have two extra bedrooms.
sentences.cn: 把阁楼改造一下，他们就可以多出两间卧室。

sentences.en: Captain Loft was as much a captain as one can imagine.
sentences.cn: 我们理想中的上尉所应有的一切,洛夫特上尉都有了.

sentences.en: He slept in a loft as a boy.
He's living in a converted loft in lower Manhattan.
sentences.cn: 他住在下曼哈顿的一间改建的阁楼里.

sentences.en: Hunter looked up and said, " Don't be hard on him, Loft. "
sentences.cn: 亨特仰头说: “ 不要对他太狠, 洛夫特. ”

sentences.en: If you're converting your loft, these addresses will be useful.
sentences.cn: 你要是打算改造阁楼，这些地址会派上用场。

sentences.en: It is always worth having a loft conversion costed out.
sentences.cn: 估算一下改建阁楼的费用总是很有必要的。

sentences.en: Loft was rigid and cold and military.
sentences.cn: 洛夫特是刚强冷酷而又遵守军纪的.

sentences.en: Our neighbours have just done aloft conversion(= changed the loft into bedrooms ).
sentences.cn: 我们的邻居刚刚完成阁楼改建。

sentences.en: The loft I lived in was extremely small and low.
sentences.cn: 我住的楼上的那间房间,更是矮小得不堪.

sentences.en: These are the people who are doing our loft conversion for us.
sentences.cn: 就是这些人在为我们改造阁楼。

sentences.en: They lived in a SoHo loft.
sentences.cn: 他们居住在索霍区改建的公寓里。

sentences.en: We could see up into the loft from bottom of the stairs.
sentences.cn: 我们能从楼梯脚边望到阁楼的内部.

sentences.en: We would like to convert the loft into another bedroom.
sentences.cn: 我们想把阁楼改造成又一间卧室。
